vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
κνήθ-ω,
later form of κνάω, scratch, ὡς λέγεται, κνήθειν οἶδεν ὄνος τὸν ὄνον [Refs 2nd c.AD+] —middle, κνήθεσθαι εἰς τὰς ἀκάνθας τὰ ἕλκη to get one's sores scratched, [Refs 4th c.BC+]
__2 passive, itch, Paul.[NT]; to be provoked, [Refs 4th c.BC+]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
(passive) to feel an itch
to scratch; to tickle, cause titillation;, in NT middle metaphorically to procure pleasurable excitement for, to indulge an itching, 2Tim. 4:3*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 抓, 搔, 搔癢, 呵癢  (提後 4:3)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 抓, 搔, 搔痒, 呵痒 (提后 4:3)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: ngứa; ngứa ngáy; gãi / ham nghe những lời êm tai, ham nghe điều gì đó dễ chịu
